about.title: Ilojaloin & me
about.intro: I am Satu Paunonen, podiatrist and entrepreneur from Vaasa – and a mother of four children. Exercise, creativity, and family keep me balanced, and people-oriented work is close to my heart. By nature, I am calm, friendly, and fundamentally positive. I am curious and enthusiastic about learning new things. I love developing my professional skills and appreciate that foot care is a field where you never finish learning – there's always something new to discover.
about.journey: I became a podiatrist through my own experiences. Since childhood, I have suffered from flat feet and various foot problems. Through them, I realized how significant feet are for overall wellbeing. I wanted to learn how I could help myself – and at the same time others – to feel better.
about.education: I graduated as a podiatrist in 2015 from Mikkeli University of Applied Sciences and have since worked at Vaasa Central Hospital's internal medicine outpatient clinic. I have also completed a basic taping course and continue to regularly develop myself in the field.
about.passion: My heart burns for working with podiatry, and as an entrepreneur, I can work from the heart – in my own way and at my own pace. It's important to me that clients feel heard and seen. I want to offer a calm, safe space where I can help each client individually and professionally.

footTherapy.title: Podiatry
footTherapy.intro: Podiatry is a service provided by a healthcare professional that focuses on foot health and wellbeing. A podiatrist takes care of foot skin and nail corrections and plans treatment plans for various foot problems. We treat, among other things:

treatments.nails: Nail diseases (fungal infections, nail fold inflammation, ingrown nails)
treatments.skin: Skin injuries and diseases (diabetic foot, ulcers, cracks)
treatments.structural: Structural problems (dysfunctions, flat feet, wear areas)

footTherapy.outro: In podiatry, the purpose is to comprehensively promote foot health, prevent problems, and improve quality of life. I treat each client individually, taking into account their needs and situation.

services.title: My Services
services.description: I offer a wide range of podiatry services designed to promote foot health and wellbeing. Each treatment is tailored to the client's individual needs.

hygiene.title: Safety and Hygiene
hygiene.intro: Hygiene and safety are the cornerstones of podiatry. I ensure that all tools and working conditions meet the highest healthcare requirements.

sterilization.title: Tool Sterilization
sterilization.description: All instruments are sterilized after use with an autoclave that destroys all bacteria, viruses, and spores. Sterilization ensures that tools are completely clean and safe for the next use.

singleUse.title: Single-Use Materials
singleUse.description: I always use disposable gloves and disinfect my hands before and after each client. Other single-use materials, such as files and polishing pads, are used only once and disposed of properly.

disinfection.title: Facility Cleaning
disinfection.description: Treatment facilities and surfaces are regularly disinfected with effective cleaning agents. I ensure that the work environment is clean, safe, and pleasant for every client.

safety.title: Client Safety
safety.description: I follow current healthcare hygiene guidelines and ensure that each treatment is carried out safely and professionally. Client wellbeing and safety are always a priority.
